titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to modify the average area purchase price of residences taken into account under the qualified mortgage bond rules.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/1/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise the formula for determining the "average area purchase price" of residences under the qualified mortgage bond rules.
